item.title: Fort Dodge House (Iowa) v1.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 23, 2025

Fort Dodge House (Iowa) v1.0 ATS

Beautiful farm house in Fort Dodge Iowa
You will find garage, sleep, repair, fuel and spawn triggers.

Credits: MattVT

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania LK 141 V8 Muito Top 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 23, 2025

Scania LK 141 V8 Muito Top 1.55 ETS2

The Scania LK 141 V8 is a legend, one of the Swedish brand’s most iconic trucks. Launched in the 1970s, it quickly became a symbol of strength and performance, especially thanks to its 14-litre V8 engine.

Highlights of the Scania LK 141 V8
V8 engine: The big difference was undoubtedly the V8 engine. At the time, it was one of the most powerful on the market, and its distinctive sound became a trademark.
Strength and Durability: The LK 141 was known for its robustness. Designed to withstand the most severe conditions, it excelled in transporting heavy loads over long distances.
Classic Design: The cab with its protruding bonnet and imposing front grille gave the truck a strong and striking look. It has a design that many truck enthusiasts consider timeless.
Popularity in Brazil: The LK 141 was very successful in Brazil, earning the affectionate nickname ‘Jacaré’ (Alligator) because of its appearance. It was one of the models responsible for cementing Scania’s reputation in the country.

To this day, the Scania LK 141 V8 is a highly respected truck, whether by collectors, older truck drivers or those who simply appreciate the history of road transport.

It remains an impressive machine and a true benchmark for ‘top trucks’.

Credits: ping

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MB 1620 2 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 23, 2025

MB 1620 2 1.55 ETS2

Unfortunately, the Mercedes-Benz MB 1620 is not officially featured in the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS 2). SCS Software, the game’s developer, has licensing agreements with a limited number of truck manufacturers, and Mercedes-Benz is not one of those partners for older models.

How to get the MB 1620 in ETS 2?
The only way to drive an MB 1620 in the game is through mods (modifications) created by the player community. There are many high-quality mods available on modding websites and on Steam Workshop.

Important points about mods:
Look for reliable mods: Always look for mods on well-known websites with good reviews. This helps to avoid compatibility issues and possible bugs in the game.
Installation: Most truck mods have a simple installation process: you download the file, place it in the ETS 2 ‘mod’ folder, and activate it in the Mod Manager within the game.
Variable quality: The quality of mods can vary greatly. Some are extremely detailed, with realistic engine sounds and accurately modelled interiors, while others may be simpler.

If you are a fan of the MB 1620, it is worth searching Steam Workshop or websites such as World of Mods to find a version that suits you. It is the best way to relive the experience of driving this classic Brazilian transport vehicle in the virtual world of ETS 2.

Credits: nacho fernandez

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VW DELIVERY 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 23, 2025

VW DELIVERY 1.55 ETS2

Like other classic vehicles and brands that do not have official partnerships with SCS Software, the Volkswagen Delivery is not included in the base game of Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS 2). It can only be played using mods created by the community.

The Volkswagen Delivery is an extremely popular truck, especially in Brazil, which is why there are several high-quality mods available for ETS 2.

How to get the VW Delivery in ETS 2 v1.55
The game version, v1.55, is the latest as of today. This is important because mods need to be updated to work properly on the latest versions of ETS 2, as SCS Software makes several changes to the game engine.

Here are the key points for finding a quality mod:
Where to look:
Steam Workshop: This is the safest and easiest place. You can search for ‘VW Delivery’ and subscribe to the mod. Steam itself will automatically download and update it.
Mod websites: Websites.
Always look for mods with good reviews and that are compatible with version 1.55.

What to expect from a good mod:
Detailed modelling: A well-made mod will have a 3D model that is faithful to the real truck, both inside and out.
Authentic sounds: The sound of the engine is one of the most important points. A quality mod will have a realistic engine sound.
Accessories and customisation: The best mods offer a variety of options, such as different types of bumpers, wheels, tanks, exhausts and even animated loads for the truck body.

Installing mods is simple: after downloading the `.scs` file, move it to the ‘mod’ folder inside the game folder in your Documents. Then, just activate the mod in the ‘Mod Manager’ in the ETS 2 main menu.

If you like the VW Delivery, it’s definitely worth looking for a good mod. The experience of driving such an iconic truck on the virtual roads of Europe is incredible.

Credits: pisc

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
